name: City of Thieves (Victor Sassi)
description:
City of Thieves a book by Ian Livingstone

This is a private project in progress. A fan-made video game version of Ian Livingstone's City Of Thieves book game.

  • Created:
    •  - Dice mechanics
    •  - Character stats creator
  • Ongoing:
    •  - Battle mechanics
    •  - Book pages as scriptable objects
